reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Strengthening Institutional Capacity of the Secretariat of Science, Technology and Innovation in Establishing Public Policies for the Productive and Sustainable Development of Maranhão

description.narrative: The main objective of this Technical Cooperation Project is to create institutional and technical conditions to contribute an effective way in the development of science, technology innovation in the state of Maranhão. From this focus, the planned activities converge on the update of organizational processes management, technical and operational of the Secretariat of Science, Technology and Innovation Maranhão state, in the sense improve their decision-making and organizational actions in the formulation and implementation of policies and programs to support scientific research and the production of knowledge.
